sentences.en: Douglas was a 29-year-old journeyman fighter, erratic in his previous fights.
sentences.cn: 道格拉斯29岁，是个技术不错的拳击手，在以前的比赛中发挥不太稳定。

sentences.en: Five leading fighter pilots have been captured and paraded before the media.
sentences.cn: 有5名一流的战斗机飞行员被俘，并被在媒体上曝光。

sentences.en: He climbed into the cockpit of the fighter.
sentences.cn: 他爬进战斗机的驾驶舱.

sentences.en: He gave a vivid account of his life as a fighter pilot.
sentences.cn: 他生动地描述了他那战斗机飞行员的生活。

sentences.en: He was a game fighter even when he was losing.
sentences.cn: 即使当他失败的时候,他也是一位勇敢的战士.

sentences.en: He was shot down by enemy fighters.
James is a fighter - he never gives up.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯是个顽强拼搏的人——他从不放弃。

sentences.en: The blow doubled the fighter over.
sentences.cn: 那一击把这个拳击手打得弯下了腰.

sentences.en: The fighter accepted money to keep himself back from winning the fight.
sentences.cn: 这位职业拳击手拿了钱,这阻碍了他在这场拳击赛中的获胜.

sentences.en: The fighter believes he can still regain some of his old magic.
sentences.cn: 这位斗士相信自己仍然可以恢复从前的一些魔力。

sentences.en: The fighter feinted with his right hand and struck with his left.
sentences.cn: 拳击手用右手虚幌一下而用左手打出去.

sentences.en: The fighter neatly fenced off a dangerous blow.
sentences.cn: 这位拳击手灵巧地挡开了十分危险的一击.

sentences.en: The promoter matched the young boxer with a more skillful fighter.
sentences.cn: 拳击竞赛主办者让这位年轻拳击手和技术更娴熟的拳师较量.

sentences.en: The Tornado jet fighter - bomber has two air intakes.
sentences.cn: 旋风式喷气轰炸机有两个空气入口.

sentences.en: The training is designed to sharpen the fighter's reflexes.
sentences.cn: 这项训练是为了加快作战者的反应速度.

sentences.en: Workers at the plant build the F-16 jet fighter.
sentences.cn: 这个工厂的工人建造F-16喷气式战斗机。

trans.tran_cn: 战士（尤指士兵或拳击者），[航]战斗机，歼击机，斗争者，奋斗者，好斗的人
trans.tran_en: a small fast military plane that can destroy other planes
